messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Special Orders for Space Station 13:Our military presence is inadequate in your sector. We need you to construct BSA-67 Artillery position aboard your station. Base parts are available for shipping via cargo. -Nanotrasen Naval Command

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "TAKEN OVER BY CLOWNS".

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: You hear thisss every ssshift, and it isssnt going to change, sssuit sssensssorsss to max, it WILL sssave your life. i have a handheld right here ssso i can sssave your asss.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: HIGHLY INFECTOUSSSE AND DEADLY DESSSEASSSE ON BOARD, MAKE YOUR WAY TO MEDICAL FOR VACCSSSINATION

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 wire eating mammals have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Well the outbreak isss contained and i think we all did really good. Great job ssstation in getting vaxed, basssically sssaved everyonesss life. Thank me later. SSStop by anytime.
